title: Chromatin changes rapidly in response to low oxygen

title_detail.value: Chromatin changes rapidly in response to low oxygen

summary: A study reveals new insights into how cells respond to oxygen deprivation. The researchers found that chromatin, the complex of DNA and proteins where all genes reside, quickly changes in response to low oxygen.

summary_detail.value: A study reveals new insights into how cells respond to oxygen deprivation. The researchers found that chromatin, the complex of DNA and proteins where all genes reside, quickly changes in response to low oxygen.
